preqs: ATS1348 or by approval from the unit coordinator

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ATS1347, ATS1348}

description: The unit consolidates intermediate skills in music ensemble performance developed in ATS1348 Music ensemble 2.The unit comprises: ensemble rehearsals in a chosen/approved music ensemble; performance of select repertoire.The development of skills prepares students for the next unit in the sequence, ATS2801 Music ensemble 4.
